title: A comprehensive study on the spatial and temporal variation of BTEX and asbestos in the northwest of Iran: Human risk assessment
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Elnaz Zarezadeh, Ahmad Jonidi Jafari, Mitra Gholami, Mahdi Farzadkia, Ehsan Ashouri, Abbas Shahsavani, Majid Kermani, Pegah Nakhjirgan
